Town Council
============

About Town Council:
-------------------

![Town Council](https://www.trophyclub.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1409)The Town Council serves as a link between the residents of Trophy Club and their municipal government. The Town of Trophy Club operates under a council-manager form of government as approved by voters through the adoption of the Town of Trophy Club Charter.

The Trophy Club Charter provides that the Trophy Club Town Council shall consist of the Mayor and six Council members elected by numbered places and are elected at-large by the registered voters of Trophy Club to serve three-year, staggered terms of office.

Councilors help constituents by connecting them to resources, services, and Town departments. Town Council also administers the Town's goals, major projects and infrastructure improvements ranging from community growth to land use to finances and strategic planning. They serve as advocates for all Trophy Club residents.

Meetings
--------

* 7 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Monday of every month
* Council Chambers  
  1 Trophy Wood Drive  
  Trophy Club, TX 76262
* Residents are welcome and encouraged to attend
* You can LIVE STREAM the Council Meetings from the [agenda center](https://www.trophyclub.org/809/Agendas-and-Minutes)or on Facebook [@TrophyClubGov](https://www.facebook.com/TrophyClubGov).  
  You can also visit the [Town of Trophy Club YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/TrophyClubGov) Channel and watch it from there [@TownCouncilMeetingReplays](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pD4nzklnfAk&list=PLPq8M84j7QlX6t3rhIPtb8rOeRxCcpqLQ)

Current and Upcoming Council Meeting Agendas
--------------------------------------------

All Town Council and Board and Commission meeting materials, effective October 1, 2023, are being posted on the new [Agenda Center](https://www.trophyclub.org/809) webpage. Meeting agendas, minutes, and videos prior to October 2023 can be found at the following locations:

* Meeting ***agendas*** and ***minutes*** can be foundat [trophyclub.org/meetingandagendaarchive](http://www.trophyclub.org/meetingandagendaarchive)
* Meeting ***videos*** can be found on our YouTube page at [trophyclub.org/meetingvideoarchive](http://www.trophyclub.org/meetingvideoarchive)

Thank you for your patience and understanding as we make improvements to your experience while we work to serve you better.
